column2: The Genies of Araby have mastery over the four native elements: water, sand, fire, and air.
Water Djinns that dwell along the coasts of Araby are fearsome indeed.
Sand Djinns that live in the deserts of Araby are a force to reckoned with.
Fire Djinns thrive under the hot sun of Araby and are powerful allies... and enemies.
Air Djinns are native to the skys of Araby and are a excellent choice when it comes to enchanting furniture.
The Magicians of Araby who dwell near the sea are adept at manipulating the Wind of Ghyran and taming Sea Nymphs.
The Magicians of the desert have their own magical tradition and are able to manipulate many of the Winds of Magic.
Some Arabyan Magicians have mastered a technique to control Fire Efreets, and have learned to control the Wind of Aqshy along the way.
Tempest Djinns and the Wind of Azyr are the powerful allies of these Arabyan Magicians.
